content: **christmas tree bag crochet pattern** this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free printable version of this crochet pattern **please note that you can purchase a bundle including patterns for all three christmas themed drawstring bags check our other listing if you are interested this christmas tree bag crochet pattern is worked up in tapestry crochet technique following a graph and/or written instructions there are two bag sizes included in this pattern **finished size** measurements taken with bag laying flat o smaller bag dimensions 3 5 wide x 6 tall o larger bag dimensions 5 wide x 7 tall this pattern is intermediate-beginner friendly but also fun for more advanced crocheters too there is also a full video tutorial showing all steps in working up this bag on my youtube channel **materials needed ** worsted weight #4 yarn cotton or acrylic yarn will work for this project three colors were used white red and green you ll need approx 60-100yds of yarn depending on the size of bag you re making most of the yardage is in white with only about 5 yards of each red and green required 4 mm crochet hook yarn needle to weave in ends you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet
